title: Combination of (#36|#74|#75|#79|#82) + XML Comment discouraging reuse of SKSvg instances
body: This is the fork I'm using now.

comments.author: Happypig375
comments.body: Merging depends on fixing tests of #75

comments.author: charlesroddie
comments.body: @Happypig375 can you give this PR a title and description? Assuming you intend it to be public.

comments.author: Happypig375
comments.body: Updated title to be more readable

comments.author: charlesroddie
comments.body:
Hi @Happypig375 . This PR is visible in the SkiaSharp.Extended repo.
The title should say what it does.
If it's a combination of things then it's highly unlikely to get merged.
There are numbers in the title that can be converted into links to the things the numbers refer to in the main text.

comments.author: mattleibow
comments.body: Thanks for this PR, but due the the fact that this library is now deprecated, I would recommend using the far superior https://github.com/wieslawsoltes/Svg.Skia
